txt.en: A rustling sound indicates the approach of some noisy creature
A Rohirrim has limped into the woods, speaking bitterly as he walked
Baillas wishes to impart a memory upon you.
You are once again observing the memory of an Ent. Someone or something approaches from the opposite direction.
The old Ent Baillas is in Fangorn.

The Ent was apparently concerned about the passage of an injured-looking Rohirrim man.\n\nYou feel concerned for him as well, for you know these folk to be generally good sorts. Surely he will need assistance if he is to survive in this particularly wild forest.
The rustling sound came from the east of Baillas.
The old Ent Baillas is in Fangorn.
Baillas's memory has ended; you must clear your head and return to reality.
Search east of Baillas for the source of the sound
